paper_title: On free and nearly free arrangements of conics admitting certain ${\rm ADE}$ singularities
abstract: The main purpose of this paper is to provide combinatorial constraints on the constructability of free and nearly free arrangements of smooth plane conics admitting certain ${\rm ADE}$ singularites.
publication_venue: 13 pages, this is the final version, including the referee's comments, to be published in Annali dell'Universit√† di Ferrara (EDGE Volume 2018 - 2022)
